original_text: When we came to you, we spoke what was true. We did not just say nice things to make you feel good. You yourselves know that. We did not try to make you give things to us. We never had a secret purpose like that. God knows that this is true.
korean_text: 너희도 알거니와 우리가 아무 때에도 아첨하는 말이나 탐심의 탈을 쓰지 아니한 것을 하나님이 증언하시느니라

sentences.original_text: We did not just say nice things
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 단지 좋은 말만 하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: We did not try to make you give things to us
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 너희가 우리에게 무언가 주도록 만들려고 하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: We never had a secret purpose like that
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 결코 그런 비밀스러운 목적을 가지지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: God knows that this is true
